Criticisms and Controversies

The Bilderberg Group has faced criticism and controversy over the years due

to concerns about its secrecy, influence, and perceived elitism. Some have

accused the group of promoting a hidden agenda or shaping global policies

without public input (url website). However, the group maintains that it

operates transparently and in accordance with democratic principles.
